Yggdrasil's long range sensors pick up a familiar spark signature 
crashing down on the planet. He closes his solitaire game and brings 
up the spark's owner's data.

Yggdrasil: No... How can...

Then he suddenly shut up as he realizes he is still a prisoner. He 
looks around to see if any of the Rogue heard him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> ????????::
> 
> The heat of re-entry causes the front of the stasis pod to glow, but 
> the transformer inside is unaffected - as if anyone would notice.  
> Next to the Maximal insignia on the pod is a warning message burned 
> into the pod's surface:  Mentally imbalanced robot - DO NOT OPEN!
> 
> The artificial meteor plunges to earth, half-burying itself in the 
> swamp muck near the Predacon base.  The sigil and warning are still 
> clearly visible.
